column4: hey im newbie. what is the command for run firefox? I need it for xbindkeys
what do you mean by define?
which is the swap partition is and how to activate it is defined in /etc/fstab if you are asking that
well i have this in my fstab: UUID=67ba5488-8cad-4278-b50c-e9f1c0e06be8 none            swap    sw              0       0
yes; what is the problem with it?
swapon: cannot find the device for UUID=67ba5488-8cad-4278-b50c-e9f1c0e06be8
well looks like the swap partition is gone or the uuid changed. did you edited your partitions recently ?
yeah i did. so that is the reason
run « sudo blkid » and find out the new uuid then update/edit fstab to reflect the changes
can you help me with that memory problem :)
